title: Lego’s digital transformation targets your inner child
content:
“Becoming a digital consumer goods company is our ambition,” says Atul Bhardwaj, Chief Digital and Technology Officer of The Lego Group, in a not entirely predictable statement statement — coming from the world’s most valuable manufacturer of physical toys. “We’ll always be anchored in the physical — just to be clear — but digital needs to come in and augment that physical build process,” Bhardwaj clarifies. “Our business has scaled a lot in the last two years; we need to make sure that our platforms and our systems also scale.” The Lego Group’s earnings for 2021 saw revenue grow 27%…

This story continues at The Next Web
description: Atul Bhardwaj, CDTO of The Lego Group, shares the digital transformation strategies driving growth for the world's most valuable toy brand.
